publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3136 Alex Neil: Judicial Appointmentsâ€”That the Parliament considers that, in light of its existence and its responsibility for justice matters, it is absurd that the Prime Minister is still responsible for the appointment of the Lord Justice General; further considers that it is insulting that the First Minister is relegated to the role of an adviser in respect of this appointment, and calls for the urgent introduction of an Order in Council to transfer responsibility for all judicial appointments from Westminster to the Scottish Parliament. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-3136 Judicial Appointments (lodged on 1 August 2005) Christine Grahame*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-3136 Judicial Appointments (lodged on 1 August 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3136 Judicial Appointments (lodged on 1 August 2005) Alasdair Morgan*
